page.title: 12Lisa's Day
page.content: It is 7.30 when I emerge from my room. I go into Mum's room to watch TV until 8.00.Then I get dressed, but I do not have to wear school uniform. I creep downstairs and have choc.& hazelnut spread on toast for breakfast. After cleaning my teeth I say goodbye and go to the shop where my friend lives. Then we walk up the hill to school. When we arrive we play till 9.00 when we go into assembly. I often play the music for the hymns. Afterwards we have maths and English. We have another playtime at 10.40 and then work until lunchtime. A typical school lunch might be fish, chips and beans followed by jam tart. After school I play with my friends and watch TV until bedtime at 9.30..
